jfxtras.labs.icalendaragenda.internal.scene.control.skin.agenda.base24hour

Class EditChoiceDialog

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.control.Dialog<ICalendarUtilities.ChangeDialogOption>
      • jfxtras.labs.icalendaragenda.internal.scene.control.skin.agenda.base24hour.AppointmentChangeDialog
        • jfxtras.labs.icalendaragenda.internal.scene.control.skin.agenda.base24hour.EditChoiceDialog
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class EditChoiceDialog
extends AppointmentChangeDialog

    Dialog to allow user to choice between ChangeDialogOption (ONE, THIS_AND_FUTURE, and ALL) edit options. The constructor requires a map of matching ChangeDialogOptions and a string of date/time range affected.

    • Property Summary

    • Field Detail

      • EDIT_DIALOG_CALLBACK

        public static final javafx.util.Callback<java.util.Map<ICalendarUtilities.ChangeDialogOption,VComponent.StartEndRange>,ICalendarUtilities.ChangeDialogOption> EDIT_DIALOG_CALLBACK

        Callback to produce an edit choice dialog based on the options in the input argument choices. Usually all or some of ONE, THIS_AND_FUTURE, and ALL.
